<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">

        <before>false</before>

        <name>Upgrade Script-May2022 (PSD)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[dataMigration();

function dataMigration() {
    var editCase = new GlideRecord(ProcurementCase.TABLE);
    editCase.addEncodedQuery('request_type=e57af20f5376301077b6ddeeff7b12b1'); //Edit a Purchase cases
    editCase.query();

    if (editCase.hasNext()) {
        editCase.setValue(ProcurementCase.CASE_TYPE, 'edit_a_purchase');
        editCase.setWorkflow(false);
        editCase.updateMultiple();
    }

    var cancelCase = new GlideRecord(ProcurementCase.TABLE);
    cancelCase.addEncodedQuery('request_type=f838328b5376301077b6ddeeff7b12f1'); //Cancel a Purchase cases
    cancelCase.query();

    if (cancelCase.hasNext()) {
        cancelCase.setValue(ProcurementCase.CASE_TYPE, 'cancel_a_purchase');
        cancelCase.setWorkflow(false);
        cancelCase.updateMultiple();
    }
}]]></script>
